    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args) throws java.io.IOException
      Loop read the user input commands Main method in map editor
      参数:
      args - receive parameters from the console
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - if command invalid

    • editMap

      public static void editMap​(java.lang.String p_Command) throws java.io.IOException
      Load a map from an existing "domination" map file or create a new map form scratch if the file does not exist
      参数:
      p_Command - command user input
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - if command invalid

    • getFile

      public static java.io.File getFile​(java.lang.String p_FileName) throws java.io.IOException
      Get a map file from an existing "domination" map file
      参数:
      p_FileName - path to file
      返回:
      the map file
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - if file not found or cannot read

    • showMap

      public static void showMap​(java.io.File p_F3) throws java.io.IOException
      Display the map as text
      参数:
      p_F3 - filename user input in editmap command
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - if file not find

    • saveMap

      public static void saveMap​(java.lang.String p_Command) throws java.io.IOException
      Save a map to a text file exactly as edited.
      参数:
      p_Command - command user input
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - if command invalid
